name: Hopper (Meadowlight Games)
description:
An intense jumping platformer prototype game.

This was my very first prototype/game and I don't come from a programming background, but for those that try it I hope you rage...I mean enjoy it! And thank you for taking time out of your day to play it!

I have a YouTube channel where I've started making devlogs so feel free to check it out if you'd like:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR1ktA-evytscVOU0JVGTnQ/videos
